problem.markdown: >>Which of the following are true about carbon dioxide (C02) emissions by humans?<< Choose the TWO statements that are correct. [] most CO2 is produced from anaerobic decomposition [] the current CO2 concentration is ~100 ppm [x] the net destruction of vegetation is a significant source [x] the combustion of fossil fuels is a significant source [] CO2 is not technically a greenhouse gas [explanation] Combustion of fossil fuels and net destruction of vegetation are the two largest sources of human derived carbon dioxide. The current CO2 concentration is ~400 ppm. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are true about carbon dioxide (C02) emissions by humans? Choose the TWO statements that are correct.

div.p: Combustion of fossil fuels and net destruction of vegetation are the two largest sources of human derived carbon dioxide. The current CO2 concentration is ~400 ppm.
